channel.title: [PI] Thieving NPCs
channel.description:
How would i make it so that if i thieve an npc only at a certain time or spot he revieves a different item other than money?
For example:
i have it so when you thieve a guard regularly you would receive gold but i want to make it so if you're at a certain spot during a quest, you would thieve a guard and receive a jail key instead of money
oh and also, i want to make it so you cant teleport in a certain spot i can probably figure it out if you give me a hint though thanks if you guys can help :)

item.title: [PI] Thieving NPCs
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

so in actionhandler i would make a case for the npc
and then add if (certainSpotInQuest) { // give key } else { // give moneh }
?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Thieving NPCs
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

if (certainSpotInQuest) {
// give key
} else {
// give moneh
}

Not exactly like that, but you get the jist.

A certain spot you mean a specific tile, or an area? If it’s an area, just add another area with it’s coordinates and

if (inarea) {
sm("You can't teleport here");
return;
}

Read full topic
